Enteprise Data / GenAI Intern Architect

US - Gaithersburg - MD

Full Time Internship Entry-level / Junior
  • Website
  • LinkedIn
  • Search

AstraZeneca

AstraZeneca is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical business and our innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide.

View all jobs at AstraZeneca

Apply now Apply later

Posted 1 month ago

We are seeking juniors and master’s students majoring in Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Science  students for a 12-Week Student Intern role to be working on a nationwide team with 3 openings in Gaithersburg, MD for a May 19th - August 8th contract period.

Position Duties:

Project The AI Catalog, API Catalog, and Datalog

Research and Data Analysis

  • One of the key responsibilities for an intern at GenAI is conducting thorough research and data analysis. This involves gathering information on industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities. Interns are expected to compile, analyze, and present data in a clear and concise manner to support decision-making processes and strategic planning.

Project Management

  • Interns at GenAI play a vital role in supporting project management efforts. This includes helping to develop project plans, tracking progress, coordinating with team members, and ensuring that project milestones are met. Interns may also be responsible for preparing documentation, scheduling meetings, and facilitating communication between different departments.

Administrative Support

  • Providing administrative support is another crucial duty of an intern at GenAI. This can encompass a variety of tasks such as managing calendars, organizing files, handling correspondence, and assisting with event planning. By efficiently taking care of administrative tasks, interns help ensure the smooth operation of the office and allow other team members to focus on their core responsibilities.

Position Requirements:

  • Undergraduate junior and Master's-level students working towards in Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Science students
  • **Candidates must have an expected graduation date after August 2025.
  • Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, Java
  • Data Analysis Tools: ArcGIS, Linux, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, RStudio, Tableau
  • Additional Skills: Risk analysis, leadership, problem-solving, strong communication, teamwork, adaptability
  • Enthusiasm for collaboration, cross-functional projects, public speaking, and presentation design.
  • US Work Authorization is required at time of application.
  • Applicants must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa (e.g., CPT, H1-B, F-1 (OPT), TN, or other non-immigrant status). This role will not be providing CPT/OPT support.
  • Ability to report onsite to Gaithersburg, MD 3-5 days a week. This role will not provide relocation assistance.
  • Minimum grade point average of 3.0

Date Posted

10-Dec-2024

Closing Date

01-Jan-2025Our mission is to build an inclusive and equitable environment. We want people to feel they belong at AstraZeneca and Alexion, starting with our recruitment process. We welcome and consider applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of characteristics. We offer reasonable adjustments/accommodations to help all candidates to perform at their best. If you have a need for any adjustments/accommodations, please complete the section in the application form.
Apply now Apply later
